Text: I am only able to confirm 3 other uploads from this torrent.  There are an extensive list of additional pages, but the link to each page does not have any torrents on the following pages.  So I am construing this to mean that this upload might have been posted via a hacked account.

is not a hacked account.

http://thepiratebay.org/user/crazy-torrent/ The page numbers below your 5 successful uploads do not reroute me to a page with actual torrents.  Just 20 something blank pages.  I've since checked a few other VIPs to ensure that my browser wasn't messed up, and viola it wasn't.

If anyone wants to take a risk, I suggest altering your MAC address of your laptop's wireless chip first to give you plausible deniability in the event an infringement email is the result of the download.
